attributes.action: stop Tony Blair from receiving a peerage .
attributes.additional_details: He along with George Bush ,started the Iraqi war, then he sent servicemen to serve in the Baltic war, and then Afghanistan, Hundreds of out soldiers died and were injured  in those wars , as well as thousand of civilians  how can a man that has done this be awarded a peerage for world peace ,,and through these wars, people have come to shelter here ,making it impossible for our ex servicemen and others  ,to find housing, and being put at the back of the ques for NHS treatment, ect
attributes.background: he is being put forward for a peerage,  for services to world peace,
